common-introduce-body:
As a software engineer, I bring the expertise needed to develop your software. I offer regular public classes, programming guidance, and course tutoring.

I excel in various programming languages, including C/C++, Javascript, Docker, and Python, as well as modern frameworks like React.js, Next.js, Nest.js, and Angular. This enables me to create high-quality web applications, websites, mobile applications, and information systems.

With a strong passion for software development, web development, algorithms, and artificial intelligence, I advocate for agile methodologies and thrive in team settings to deliver exceptional products.

Beyond my professional pursuits, I indulge in my love for travel, constantly seeking to explore and embrace new cultures.
